Uses of Interface
model.strategy.IUpdateStrategy

  • Packages that use IUpdateStrategy 
    Package Description
    model  
    model.strategy  

    • Uses of IUpdateStrategy in model

      Fields in model declared as IUpdateStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private IUpdateStrategy Ball.updateStrategy
      The update strategy of the state of the ball.
      Methods in model that return IUpdateStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IUpdateStrategy Ball.getUpdateStrategy()
      Returns the current strategy of this Ball.
      Methods in model with parameters of type IUpdateStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void BallWorldModel.addBall(IUpdateStrategy updateStrategy, IPaintStrategy paintStrategy, java.awt.Component canvas)
      Add a ball with given update strategy which cannot be changed thereafter.
      void BallWorldModel.setSwitcherStrategy(IUpdateStrategy strategy)
      Set the switchable strategy in current model that all switcher balls use.
      void Ball.setUpdateStrategy(IUpdateStrategy updateStrategy)
      Sets the current strategy of this Ball to the given strategy.
      Constructors in model with parameters of type IUpdateStrategy 
      Constructor and Description

    • Uses of IUpdateStrategy in model.strategy

      Classes in model.strategy that implement IUpdateStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BreathingStrategy
      An IUpdateStrategy implementation that updates the radius of a ball.
      class  ColorStrategy
      A IUpdateStrategy implementation that updates the color of a ball.
      class  CurveStrategy
      An IUpdateStrategy implementation that turns the direction by a random angle between 0 and 18 degree clockwise.
      class  DrunkStrategy
      A IUpdateStrategy implementation that randomly chooses a strategy out of Breathing, Color, Wander and Curve Strategy to update the ball.
      class  MultiStrategy
      An IUpdateStrategy implementation that represents a pair of two strategies.
      class  StraightStrategy
      A IUpdateStrategy implementation that does not update the state of a ball.
      class  SwitcherStrategy
      An IUpdateStrategy implementation that can change its underlying update strategy dynamically.
      class  WanderStrategy
      An IUpdateStrategy implementation that set the velocity of a ball randomly.
      Fields in model.strategy declared as IUpdateStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static IUpdateStrategy[] DrunkStrategy.STRATEGIES
      The set of update strategies to randomly choose from.
      private IUpdateStrategy MultiStrategy.strategy1
      The first update strategy.
      private IUpdateStrategy MultiStrategy.strategy2
      The second update strategy.
      private IUpdateStrategy SwitcherStrategy.updateStrategy
      The underlying update strategy in use.
      Methods in model.strategy that return IUpdateStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IUpdateStrategy SwitcherStrategy.getUpdateStrategy()
      Get the underlying update strategy in use.
      IUpdateStrategy IUpdateStrategyFac.make()
      Create an concrete IUpdateStrategy instance.
      Methods in model.strategy with parameters of type IUpdateStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void SwitcherStrategy.setUpdateStrategy(IUpdateStrategy strategy)
      Set the underlying strategy to a new strategy.
      Constructors in model.strategy with parameters of type IUpdateStrategy 
      Constructor and Description
      MultiStrategy(IUpdateStrategy strat1, IUpdateStrategy strat2)
      Construct a multistrategy as a combination of two given update strategies.
      SwitcherStrategy(IUpdateStrategy strategy)
      Construct a SwitcherStrategy with the given update strategy as the initial one to use.
